definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
equivalent to 就可以/can then (do sth)/can immediately (do sth)/(do sth) and that will suffice
it is a pity/what a pity/unfortunately
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible

sentences.english: One flat can accommodate a family of five.
sentences.chinese: 一套房間可供五口之家居住。

sentences.english: All non-Nepalese students enrolled at any of Hong Kong's universities are eligible to participate in the contest.
sentences.chinese: 所有非尼泊爾裔香港註冊大學學生均可參加。

sentences.english: Any liquid could be solidified under the certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 任何液體在一定條件下均可固化。

sentences.english: Blush can be poured through a hidden semi-transparent cover, very fitting skin.
sentences.chinese: 腮紅可透過隱藏的半透明罩倒出，極度貼合肌膚。

sentences.english: The thickened septa are most often smooth, but septal nodules may sometimes be seen.
sentences.chinese: 增厚的小葉間隔常平滑，但有時可呈結節狀。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替換性僅限於修改依賴關係以依賴不同的內容。

sentences.english: It has a set of changeable spindles with wide measuring range.
sentences.chinese: 備有一組可換接杆，測量範圍大。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 還可喫一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸氣的飲料。

sentences.english: Mosquito bites can be prevented by spraying the body with a chemical containing DEET.
sentences.chinese: 蚊蟲叮咬，可阻止含有避蚊胺噴灑化學物質的身體。

sentences.english: Can be used for very elemental analysis, storage of organic solvents.
sentences.chinese: 可用於很量分析元素，存儲有機溶劑。

sentences.english: Part four elaborates the author's opinion about the basis of the criminal responsibility of the actio libera in cause.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，原因自由行爲之可罰性基礎的再思考。

sentences.english: Spread foundations generally can be classified as wall and column footings.
sentences.chinese: 擴展基礎通常可分爲牆基和柱基。

sentences.english: It is also named green architecture of city cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 這種建築也可稱爲“城市窯洞”式綠色建築。

sentences.english: Shapeshifting will no longer cancel Water Walking.
The cost of seeds per mu could save 500 yuan and the total cost be half.
sentences.chinese: 每畝可節約種子費500多元，工本費可節省一半。

sentences.english: The cost of seeds per mu could save 500 yuan and the total cost be half.
sentences.chinese: 每畝可節約種子費500多元，工本費可節省一半。

definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
